full_summary:
**EF944-231722_B Upgrade to Evacuation Standards**
================[source](#source)**

### Details

*   **Reference Number:** WS3851680018-Document3969024202
*   **Amendment Number:** 7
*   **Publication Date:** April 19, 2023
*   **Closing Date:** May 31, 2023, at 14:00:00 (EDT)

### Description
UPGRADE OF EVACUATION STANDARDS TO FIRE CODE LEGISLATION

The Department of Public Works and Services (PSPC) invites tenders, under TenderCall CW-MC10500CA, for a Request for Proposal (RFP) to upgrade a research and development centre to meet current fire evacuation standards.

**Scope of Work**
The RFP includes a number of works to be carried out, including the removal, installation, relocation, and patching of doors and their hardware located in Saint-Hyacinthe, Quebec, Canada. The scope of work is outlined in Annex A of the bidding documents.

### Evaluation and Award

The RFP will be evaluated based on the lowest price. Debriefing or feedback sessions will be conducted with bidders upon request who bid on the previous solicitation.

### Deadline 

Submissions must be received by not later than 14:00:00 EDT on May 31, 2023. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

### Bidding Documents

The complete tendering document and drawings/construction are available under the following URL: [TO BE ADDED].

### Contact

For further information, please contact:

Samuel Pearson
SPAC/PSPC
samuel.pearson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

<sup>1</sup> This tender is issued under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
